manpage.name: libdclbase
manpage.summary: a C++ framework for cross-platform application development.

description.p: The dbPager Classes Library (DCL) is a C++ framework for cross-platform application development. DCL provides single-source portability across Microsoft Windows, Linux and all major Unix variants.

DCL provides application developers with all the functionality needed to build applications with system native graphical user interface, web applications as well as simple console utilites. DCL is fully object-oriented and easily extensible. It uses some of modern C++ features like templates, exceptions and STL.
DCL is splitted into several libraries to provide flexible linking with your applications: libdclbase, libdclnet and libdclodbc.
